doc_string.value:
@notice Get the total number of tokens which have vested, that are held
            by this contract

@notice Get the total number of tokens which are still locked
            (have not yet vested)

@notice Get the number of tokens which have vested for a given address
    @param _recipient address to check

@notice Get the number of unclaimed, vested tokens for a given address
    @param _recipient address to check

@notice Get the number of locked tokens for a given address
    @param _recipient address to check

@notice Claim tokens which have vested
    @param addr Address to claim tokens for

@notice Transfer ownership of GaugeController to `addr`
    @param addr Address to have ownership transferred to

natspec.author: Mobius Finance
natspec.details: Intended to be deployed many times via `VotingEscrowFactory`

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the number of unclaimed, vested tokens for a given address

params.addr: Address to have ownership transferred to

initialize(address,address,address,uint2.details: This function is seperate from `__init__` because of the factory pattern used in `VestingEscrowFactory.deploy_vesting_contract`. It may be called once per deployment.

params._amount: Amount of tokens being vested for `_recipient`
params._can_disable: Can admin disable recipient's ability to claim tokens?
params._end_time: Time until everything should be vested
params._start_time: Epoch time at which token distribution starts
params._token: Address of the ERC20 token being distributed

lockedOf(address).notice: Get the number of locked tokens for a given address

lockedSupply().notice: Get the total number of tokens which are still locked (have not yet vested)

toggle_disable(address).details: When disabled, the address is only unable to claim tokens which are still locked at the time of this call. It is not possible to block the claim of tokens which have already vested.
toggle_disable(address).notice: Disable or re-enable a vested address's ability to claim tokens

vestedOf(address).notice: Get the number of tokens which have vested for a given address

vestedSupply().notice: Get the total number of tokens which have vested, that are held by this contract

natspec.notice: Vests `ERC20MOBI` tokens for a single address
natspec.title: Simple Vesting Escrow
